text: Leslie Edwin Barratt (born 13 August 1945) is an English former professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Nuneaton Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Windermere F.C. players Category:Barrow A.F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Southport F.C. players Category:Corby Town F.C. players Category:Cambridge City F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Arcadia Shepherds F.C. players Category:Louth United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Les Barratt
